name: Pixel Union
description:
Pixel Union is a leading design agency known for themes, apps, ecommerce and custom digital solutions. Their theme design and development work has factored significantly in the growth of platforms like Shopify, BigCommerce and Tumblr, establishing Pixel Union’s reputation as a world-class design partner for brands and platforms alike.
Since 2009, Pixel Union’s digital products have been used by millions of people and organizations around the world, including the White House, Tesla, MoMA, the LA Lakers, the BBC, and more.
